Plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.
Title: Hoosiers
Actors: Gene Hackman, Barbara Hershey, Dennis Hopper, Sheb Wooley
tomatoConsensus: It may adhere to the sports underdog formula, but Hoosiers has been made with such loving craft, and features such excellent performances, that it's hard to resist.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.
